    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of the Client class, Has a default host and port, so client can access the server, *
      Parameters:
      args - address and port to start enter the server.

    • getPort

      private static int getPort(String[] args)
      Gets the port specified in the arguments
      Parameters:
      args - console arguments
      Returns:
      the specified port if its valid otherwise returns 8888

    • getIp

      private static InetAddress getIp(String[] args)
      Gets the Ip specified in the arguments
      Parameters:
      args - console arguments
      Returns:
      the specified IP if its valid otherwise returns localhost

    • start

      private void start(InetAddress host, int port) throws IOException
      This method starts the connection between client and server, Creates a new socket and a new thread that reads the input commands by the client and executes them.
      Parameters:
      host - Host String as a parameter,
      port - int port as a parameter,
      Throws:
      IOException - when it's not possible to connect to the server

    • checkCommand

      private void checkCommand(String line, Socket socket)
      Prints the correspondent Message, plays the correspondent song, and/or sets turn permission to true, depending on the command it receives as parameter.
      Parameters:
      line - receives a String that represents a command.

    • play

      private void play(String name)
      Plays a Clip from certain index.
      Parameters:
      name - receives an int that is the index position of that Clip.

    • close

      private void close(Socket socket, BufferedReader in, PrintWriter out) throws IOException
      Closes the Socket, the PrintWriter and the BufferedReader.
      Throws:
      IOException
